email.title: DoCSoc Summer Picnic
email.text:
DoCSoc's first event of the year, the Summer Picnic is a chance to get out in the sun (hopefully), see your friends again, and meet some of the new committee. The event is free to attend, and we will have plenty of *food* and *drinks* (both alcoholic and non-alcoholic)!
**Registration link:** https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/docsoc-summer-picnic-tickets-694975228617?aff=linktree
- 📆 **Date:** Saturday 19th August 2023 - 🕒 **Time:** 15:00 - 18:00 - 📍 **Location:** Prince's Gardens, London, SW7 1NH (next to Southside and Eastside halls)
Secure your pizza - register now on Eventbrite through the link above to share your dietary preferences with us. We'll make sure you're catered for - but can only guarantee this if you register in advance on Eventbrite, and as early as possible.
